projects.name: advanced-binding
projects.description: advanced-bindings is a collection of useful helpers and custom binding implementations to simplify the development of applications that are heavily based on JavaFX's Properties and Bindings.

projects.name: ObjectFiller.NET
projects.description: The .NET ObjectFiller fills the properties of your .NET objects with random data! It has a very comfortable Fluent API. You are able to fill object instances or you just let them create for you.

projects.name: Dynamic Specs
projects.description: An easy to use specfication framework as extension for NUnit and MSTest.
